metadata.title: LuLu 247 Titanium Credit Card - Elevate Shopping Experience | Emirates NBD

content:
0% interest on balance transfer (6 or 12 months tenure) with no processing fee
Terms and conditions
Applicable at the time of onboarding
Minimum Balance Transfer amount of  1,000 is required
The total Balance Transfer amount requested cannot exceed more than 50% of the available Credit Limit
If the Balance Transfer amount requested is greater than 50% of the approved Credit Limit then the Balance Transfer amount will be amended and 50% of the approved Credit Limit will be booked by the bank
Fixed instalment of the Balance Transfer amount will be charged across the selected tenure and the amount of each Balance Transfer monthly installment shall be computed by dividing the principal amount by the number of months for the term of the balance Transfer
Other Emirates NBD Credit Card Installment Facilities Terms and Conditions applies,
